name: Senator Oluremi Tinubu
title: First Lady of the Federal Republic of Nigeria
bio: The visionary patron whose commitment to education and youth development inspired the creation of the Dream Centre.

name: Oba Enitan Adeyeye Ogunwusi
title: Ooni of Ife

image.alt: Portrait of the Ooni of Ife

bio: Conceptualized and donated the building. Championed the project since 2019, transforming a former jungle area into a modern hub.

name: Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi
title: Director General, NITDA

image.alt: Portrait of the NITDA Director General

bio: Supplied all IT-enabled devices and AI tools within the facility, enabling digital technology and storytelling to preserve history.
